title: Trojan Detection Container (trojai-example) - The template detector to be used within the TrojAI competition.
technique_description: Extracts model weights and trains a random forest regressor.

train_weight_rso_seed.description: Random state seed for weights during training.

train_weight_params_mean.description: Mean of the normal distribution used for the weight table.

train_weight_params_std.description: Standard deviation of the normal distribution used for the weight table.

train_random_forest_regressor_param_n_es.description: Number of trees in the forest.

train_random_forest_regressor_param_crit.description: Function to measure the quality of a split.

train_random_forest_regressor_param_max_.description: The maximum depth of the tree

train_random_forest_regressor_param_min_.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.
The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.
The minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights (of all the input samples) required to be at a leaf node.

train_random_forest_regressor_param_max_.description: The number of features to consider when looking for the best split.

train_random_forest_regressor_param_min_.description: A node will be split if this split induces a decrease of the impurity greater than or equal to this value.
